Primer candidates as determined by Primer3 for the _AvrRvi5_ canididate atg4290.
This search was based on genomic data rather than CDS data used in the other examples.

The version of primer 3 used was 2.3.6.

The command was run with the following Boulder (See <http://primer3.sourceforge.net/primer3_manual.htm#commandLineTags>) options:

```
{
    "SEQUENCE_ID": "atg4290",
    "SEQUENCE_TARGET": [
        [
            1579,
            3
        ]
    ],
    "SEQUENCE_EXCLUDED_REGION": [
        [
            459,
            102
        ]
    ],
    "SEQUENCE_TEMPLATE": "",
    "SEQUENCE_INCLUDED_REGION": [
        0,
        1809
    ]
}
{
    "PRIMER_NUM_RETURN": 500,
    "PRIMER_OPT_TM": 64.0,
    "PRIMER_MUST_MATCH_THREE_PRIME": "NNNSS",
    "PRIMER_MIN_TM": 58.0,
    "PRIMER_EXPLAIN_FLAG": 0,
    "PRIMER_MAX_GC": 60.0,
    "PRIMER_MAX_SELF_ANY": 12,
    "PRIMER_PAIR_MAX_COMPL_END": 8,
    "PRIMER_PAIR_MAX_COMPL_ANY": 12,
    "PRIMER_PRODUCT_SIZE_RANGE": [
        [
            1100,
            1300
        ],
        [
            900,
            1100
        ],
        [
            700,
            900
        ],
        [
            500,
            700
        ]
    ],
    "PRIMER_MIN_SIZE": 18,
    "PRIMER_MAX_SIZE": 25,
    "PRIMER_MAX_NS_ACCEPTED": 0,
    "PRIMER_MAX_SELF_END": 8,
    "PRIMER_OPT_SIZE": 22,
    "PRIMER_MAX_TM": 68.0,
    "PRIMER_MIN_GC": 40.0
}
```

Note that these are in json format rather than boulder.
